body_html:
I think, tensorboard.visualize_graph(graph) sounds reasonable. But we should also support the same in the usual flow with something like tf.export_graph() , which should export the pbtxt file in the loddir, and then tensor board --logdir=<> works as usual, if there is nothing else to show, it shows only the graph.
What do you think?
body_text:
I think, tensorboard.visualize_graph(graph) sounds reasonable. But we should also support the same in the usual flow with something like tf.export_graph() , which should export the pbtxt file in the loddir, and then tensor board --logdir=<> works as usual, if there is nothing else to show, it shows only the graph.
What do you think?
body:
I think, tensorboard.visualize_graph(graph) sounds reasonable. But we should also support the same in the usual flow with something like tf.export_graph() , which should export the pbtxt file in the loddir, and then tensor board --logdir=<> works as usual, if there is nothing else to show, it shows only the graph.
What do you think?
